gui.buttonmode.managermode

Class ButtonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.buttonmode.managermode.ButtonManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HammingCodeManager, MNISTManager, VierBitXorManager, XORManager

    public abstract class ButtonManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is responsible for managing the normal button panel, which is to be found on the right.

    Note that managing here means registering and reacting to button clicks.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fabian von der Warth

      • saved

        public boolean saved
        If this is set to true, there have not been any changes made on the nn.

      • hasNeuralNet

        public boolean hasNeuralNet
        If this is set to true, nn is not equal to null.

      • inTraining

        public boolean inTraining
        If this is set to true, the neural network is currently getting trained.

      • pausedTraining

        public boolean pausedTraining
        If this is set to true, there still is training going on, but it is currently paused.

        public boolean continuedWithoutSaving

        The current Training, if any.

      • saveDialog

        private javax.swing.JDialog saveDialog
        The current save dialog, so the dialog that gets called when the user wanted to go somewhere while there were unsaveds changes.

      • continuewithoutsaving

        private javax.swing.JButton continuewithoutsaving
        This button can be found in the saveDialog. If this button gets pressed, the user will continue without saving thereby dumping all unsaved changes.

      • continueandsave

        private javax.swing.JButton continueandsave
        This button can be found in the saveDialog. If this button gets pressed, the user will continue while the current neural network will be saved.

      • saveIntervened

        public java.awt.event.ActionEvent saveIntervened
        This will continue the program where it stopped after a saving dialog.

                               boolean configure)
        Adds all the basic fields to the NeuralNet creation or configuration dialog.
        Parameters:

        configure - if this is set to true, then this jdialog got called by clicking on the edit hyperparameters button.

      • erzeugeHyperparameter

        public abstract Hyperparameter erzeugeHyperparameter(boolean configure)
        Starts creating the hyper parameters jdialog.
        Parameters:
        configure - configure is set to true if the edit hyper parameters button gets clicked as edit of the neural network.
        Returns:
        finished hyper parameters

      • setupHyperparameter

        public void setupHyperparameter(boolean configure)
        Creates the basic Jdialog needed when wanting retrieve the new hyper parameters.
        Parameters:
        configure - configure is set to true if the edit hyper parameters button gets clicked as edit of the neural network

      • erzeugeError

        public void erzeugeError(java.lang.String message,
                         java.awt.Component c)
        Creates an error window with custom message and custom return component.
        Parameters:
        message - custom error message
        c - custom return component

      • erzeugeNeuralNet

        public NeuralNet erzeugeNeuralNet(java.lang.String mode,
                                  java.lang.String inputs,
                                  boolean inputEditable,
                                  java.lang.String outputs,
                                  boolean outputEditable,
                                  boolean hiddenEditable,
                                  boolean activationEditable)
        Starts creating the jdialog for creating a neural network
        Parameters:
        mode - which training type is set, for example "XOR" or "MNIST"
        inputs - standard input neurons for training type
        inputEditable - if the input neurons are editable
        outputs - standard output neurons for training type
        outputEditable - if the output neurons are editable
        hiddenEditable - if the hidden neurons are editable
        activationEditable - if the activation functions are editable
        Returns:
        finishedf neural network

      • erzeugeNeuralNetJFileChooser

        public abstract NeuralNetTrainDataObject erzeugeNeuralNetJFileChooser(java.lang.String title)
        This method gets called when you have to specify the path of your new neural network.
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        Returns:
        loaded neural network and its training history

      • erzeugeSaveDialog

        public void erzeugeSaveDialog(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Creates the unsaved changes j dialog
        Parameters:
        e - underlying event, so that the program can be continued there after this dialog.
